channel.title: Blogs on MagPie DevOps
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on MagPie DevOps

item.title: Machine Learning Best Practises
item.description: Assuming you have your cool new machine learned model, you will probably be wanting to show it off to your friends. This post will lay out a couple of best practises around hosting and running your machine learned models

item.title: Consumer Driven Contracts
item.description: This post groups all sources I have found useful when preparing my presentation on Consumer Driven Contract.
